title: [Large-scale] Designing Educational IoT Adoption Strategies for Online Learning Environment Construction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic IoT technology understanding and online learning platform proficiency
context.additional_context: Education focused on developing customized IoT solutions aimed at improving workplace environments for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three user psychological factors (optimism, inconvenience, anxiety) to consider when introducing educational IoT.
Learners can interpret SEM (Structural Equation Modeling)-based analysis results and apply them to IoT adoption strategies.
Learners can develop an educational IoT product proposal based on learner characteristics analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
